mapper.sql: id AS "id", turnover_id AS "turnoverId", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_id AS "materialId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_unit AS "mUnit", m_number AS "mNumber", create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

SELECT wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.id AS "id", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.turnover_id AS "turnoverId", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_id AS "materialId", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_type AS "materialType", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_name AS "materialName", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.m_batch AS "mBatch", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.m_unit AS "mUnit", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.m_number AS "mNumber", wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.create_time AS "createTime", wms_cabinet2_turnover.barcode AS "barcode", wms_material_type.plant AS "plant", wms_material_type.sizes as "sizes" FROM (wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind LEFT JOIN wms_cabinet2_turnover on wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.turnover_id=wms_cabinet2_turnover.id) LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_type_id=wms_material_type.id where 1 = 1
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_turnover.barcode like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.barcode},'%')
and wms_material_type.plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.*,wms_cabinet2_turnover.barcode from wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind LEFT JOIN wms_cabinet2_turnover on wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind.turnover_id=wms_cabinet2_turnover.id where turnover_id = #{turnoverID}
mapper.update: update wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind set m_number = #{number} where turnover_id = #{turnoverID}
mapper.select: select c.id AS "id", c.turnover_id AS "turnoverId", c.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", c.material_id AS "materialId", c.material_type AS "materialType", c.material_name AS "materialName", c.material_sku AS "materialSku", c.m_batch AS "mBatch", c.m_unit AS "mUnit", c.m_number AS "mNumber", c.create_time AS "createTime", w.turnover_number as "turnoverNumber" from wms_cabinet2_turnover_bind as c left join wms_cabinet2_turnover as w on c.turnover_id = w.id where w.id = #{turnoverID}
